text: James David Wolfensohn, KBE, AO (1 December 1933 - 25 November 2020) was an Australian-American lawyer, investment banker and economist. He was the ninth president of the World Bank Group from 1995 to 2005. Wolfensohn died in New York City on 25 November 2020 from pneumonia-related problems, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian lawyers Category:Presidents of the World Bank Group Category:Australian economists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:American economists Category:Writers from Sydney
title: James Wolfensohn
